description: Enterprise techniques used by attrib, ATT&CK software S1176 (v1.0)
name: attrib (S1176)

techniques.comment: [attrib](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1176) can be used to make files or directories hidden.(Citation: Microsoft attrib 2023)(Citation: gbhackers Darkgate Malware 2024)(Citation: LogRhythm WannaCry)(Citation: Checkpoint WannaCry 2017)(Citation: Unit42 ComboJack 2018)
